name: Starbase Alpha
description:
IMPORTANT: I Discovered a rogue line of code right after submission. This rogue line destroys the game to its core by crashing it's framerate to the floor. So the game ends after wave 2-4 and a maniacal game crashing demon inhabits the station, ruining all of  your fun, so you're not alone. The bug is technically fixed, but you can't get the fix because of the rules of the Brackeys Game Jam. Sorry! 

"You are Jake Moon, the galaxy's best detective, and the first person to step foot on Starbase Alpha in 20 years. You're there to find out why"

In this arcade shooter, you are left stranded on abandoned space station and tasked with defending your life by holding of hordes of aliens. But you're not alone. Also on the ship is the soul of the last remaining crew member, and he's ready to help. 

Made in GameMaker for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.
